welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Perry Barr, a charming neighborhood in the heart of Birmingham known for its vibrant culture and friendly locals. We invite you to indulge in all it has to offer and make unforgettable memories during your stay. Enjoy your time here!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Birmingham Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The smaller terminal at Birmingham Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speeds or data usage.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at West Midlands International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at West Midlands International Airport is responsible for handling all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
